text:
Bring your cakes to life with the Surprise
Cakes App by How To Cook That

Firstly print out your marker cut it out and
put it on our cake.

Open you app and press the movie clapper button
then line up the guide with the marker and
see you cake come to life with a magical unicorn.

Make it move or you can change its colour
pressing the buttons on the other side and

you can even take photos with the birthday
kid behind it.

Or a dragon that lives inside the cake and
flies out or even fireworks.

Surprise cakes app available now on itunes
and google play.
